= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *NE Receptors of Atrium Muscles (heart-symp-control)*: increase overall activity of heart
  * *ACh Receptors of Atrium Muscles (heart-psymp-control)*: decrease firing rate of SA node, slowing transmission of pacemaker impulse
  * *Baroreceptors in Aorta (heart-aorta-baroreceptors)*: increase in blood pressure signal
  * *Baroreceptors in Carotid Artery (heart-carotid-baroreceptors)*: increase in blood pressure signal
  * *Visceral Receptors (heart-visceral)*: temperature and pain
